News Title: AIL: Board Meeting schedule under LR 19(1)
News: As per Regulation 19(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, the Company has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on October 30, 2022 at 3:00 PM to consider, among others, audited financial statements of the Company for the year ended June 30, 2022.

News Title: AFTABAUTO: Closing the Operation of Motor Cycle Unit
News: The Company has informed that the operation of Motor Cycle Unit has been closed and the fixed asset of the Unit of BDT 27,77,86,431.00 will be adjusted in Current Assets of the Company.

News Title: 1JANATAMF: Q1 Financials
News: (Q1 Un-audited): EPU was Tk. (0.23) for July-September, 2022 as against Tk. 0.20 for July-September, 2021; NOCFPU was Tk. 0.03 for July-September, 2022 as against Tk. 0.24 for July-September, 2021. NAV per unit at market price was Tk. 9.87 as on September 30, 2022 and Tk. 10.80 as on June 30, 2022. NAV per unit at cost price was Tk. 10.91 as on September 30, 2022 and Tk. 11.64 as on June 30, 2022.

News Title: ADNTEL: Board Meeting schedule under LR 16(1)
News: As per Regulation 16(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, the Company has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on October 30, 2022 at 3:00 PM to consider, among others, un-audited financial statements of the Company for the First Quarter (Q1) period ended September 30, 2022.

News Title: AGRANINS: Q3 Financials
News: (Q3 Un-audited): EPS was Tk. 0.44 for July-September 2022 as against Tk. 0.60 for July-September 2021; EPS was Tk. 1.16 for January-September 2022 as against Tk. 1.36 for January-September 2021. NOCFPS was Tk. (0.10) for January-September 2022 as against Tk. (0.12) for January-September 2021. NAV per share was Tk. 19.50 as on September 30, 2022 and Tk. 19.84 as on December 31, 2021.

News Title: AGNISYSL: Price Limit Open
News: There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (26.10.2022) following its corporate declaration.

News Title: ACIFORMULA: Update of Information
News: (Continuation news of ACIFORMULA): Brokerage/DPs to provide the details (shareholder's name, BO ID, e-mail address, shareholding position, gross dividend receivable, applicable tax rate and net divided receivable) of their Margin Loan Holders who hold Company's share on the Record Date to share office or email to monir@aci-bd.com along with DPs Bank details (account name, account number, routing No., etc.), latest by 15 December 2022.
